t:
“Hee Hee, Now you can't see me,” the kid said playfully as she placed her hands over my eyes.



However, I realized that she wasn't playing once she started
to gouge my eyes out.
c:
I was even more scared when I realized that I was standing up and her voice was coming from beside my ears.



#kid #play #hideandseek #eyes #gouge #evil #plan #pain





Based on a real incident.
